price: 9. Waxaa sidaas ugu wacan waxay naceen waxa uu Alle soo dejiyey (oo Xaq ah), markaasuu ka yeelay acmaashooda waxaan waxba ka jirin.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَرِهُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum karihū mā anzala al-lahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
